sourcesContent: import{jsxs as i,jsx as n}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as t}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as o}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{Button as r}from"../../../primitives/Button/Button.js";import{Flex as e}from"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";const s=()=>{const{isPending:s,toSignIn:m}=o((i=>[i.isPending,i.toSignIn]));return i(e,Object.assign({direction:"column"},{children:[n(r,Object.assign({isDisabled:s,type:"submit",variation:"primary",fontWeight:"normal",isLoading:s,loadingText:t("Confirming")},{children:t("Confirm")})),n(r,Object.assign({onClick:m,type:"button",variation:"link",fontWeight:"normal",size:"small"},{children:t("Back to Sign In")}))]}))};export{s as ConfirmSignInFooter};
